Step 1 -- Paste GCPs from allmaps

ex:
1568 3236 -90.06925613 44.02153106
1612 6006 -90.06885239 44.02033048
1544 341 -90.06968814 44.02287122
3492 5999 -90.06758505 44.02047896

Step 2 -- Convert to QGIS .points format

This reformats coodinates from mapX mapY sourceX sourceY to sourceX, sourceY, mapX, -mapY.


    


    
Step 3 -- Download .points and import into QGIS Georeferencer


    

        
Enter a filename to download (ends in .points by default):
